channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Suspect in National Guard attack struggled with ‘dark isolation’ as community raised concerns
item.description: The Afghan man accused of gunning down two National Guard members blocks from the White House last week had been unraveling for years.

item.title: US halts all asylum decisions after shooting of National Guard members
Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe
